name: Watercolor Animal Portraits and Flowers
description:
Watercolor Animal Portraits and Flowers

This is the collection of 60 individual watercolour portraits featuring different wild animals with or without watercolour florals and gold / rose gold geometric frames.

The animals are: a cat, a hare, a horse, a llama, a wolf, a tiger, a leopard, a lion, a zebra, a giraffe, a stag and a doe.

Each animal is presented in 5 ways:

– as it is (individual high resolution PNG files)

– in flowers and leaves (individual high resolution PNG files)

– with flowers on their heads (individual high resolution PNG files)

– in gold / rose gold floral geometric frames (individual high resolution PNG files)

– on A4 pre-made posters ready to print and frame (individual A4 high resolution JPEG files)

These illustrations are great to use for arts and crafts, scrapbooking, stationery, card making, party and wedding invitations, Valentine’s Day cards, planners, blog banners and backgrounds, logo elements, wall art and many more.

Product details:

– 12 individual PNG files of each animal

– 12 individual PNG files of each animal in flowers

– 12 individual PNG files of each animal with flowers on their heads

– 12 individual PNG files of each animal in gold / rose gold floral frames

– 12 individual A4 JPEG posters of each animal
